title: Need help to save someone's life
selftext:
*Your Support Can Let My Friend's Wife Defeat Aplastic Anemia!* 

Please assist us in raising the necessary funds to save a life. Your assistance is greatly appreciated. Please spread the word about this story to your family and friends so that we can get the most help possible.

*Read More:* http://impactguru.com/s/4ElInb

*Donate Here:* http://impactguru.com/s/yCmvmD

*NEFT / IMPS / RTGS*
(Transfers to this account number would be allowed from Banks in India only)
===========================
Account number: 2223330047434284
Account name: Pallavi Chauhan
IFSC code: RATN0VAAPIS
Bank Name: RBL Bank
===========================

-------------------------------------
*UPI Handle:*
supportpallavi01@yesbankltd
*Pay via GooglePay / PhonePe / UPI (Android Only):* http://impactguru.com/s/WiW1TB
-------------------------------------
*Donations via YES UPI and RBL Bank Transfers are safe with ImpactGuru.*
